text: Ask ˹them, O Prophet˺, “Should we invoke, other than God, those ˹idols˺ which cannot benefit or harm us, and turn back to disbelief after God has guided us? ˹If we do so, we will be˺ like those disoriented by devils in the wilderness, while their companions call them to guidance, ˹saying˺, ‘Come to us!’ Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “God’s guidance is the ˹only˺ true guidance. And we are commanded to submit to the Lord of all worlds
